title: Acon Digital DeVerberate v1.5.3 Incl. Keygen-R2R [ATOM]
description:
Description:
The balance between direct sound and reverberation is essential for the acoustic quality of audio recordings. DeVerberate is plug-in that can attenuate or boost the reverberation that is already present in recorded material.

The novel real-time algorithm works equally well with mono as with stereo recordings and splits the incoming audio into an estimation of the direct sound and the reverberated sound which can then be recombined freely. The improvement process can be monitored visually using the spectral representations of the input and output signal as well as of the estimated reverberation.


Features:
-Attenuate reverberation in existing recordings
-Change the perceived distance in a mix by changing the balance between the direct sound and the reverberation
-Improve dialog and location sound
-Forensic specialist can improve speech intelligibility
-Boost the natural reverberation in existing recordings


What's New in Version 1.5.3:
-New visual appearance.
-Support for visual themes.
-Improved suppression of the first reflections.
-New preset manager with XML export and import.
-Unlimited undo and redo history.
-A and B settings for quick comparisons.
-Further bug fixes and minor improvements.


System Requirements:
-A Pentium IV or higher
-Minimum 256 MB RAM (1 GB recommended)
-Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista or Windows XP
-A host application that is compatible with VST or AAX (32 bit or 64 bit)
